verbs.description: Trump [V: is] hoping lawmakers will help him drive a tougher deal , but he should n’t count on that .
[ARG0: Trump] is [V: hoping] [ARG1: lawmakers will help him drive a tougher deal] , but he should n’t count on that .
Trump is hoping lawmakers [V: will] help him drive a tougher deal , but he should n’t count on that .
Trump is hoping [ARG0: lawmakers] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: help] [ARG1: him drive a tougher deal] , but he should n’t count on that .
Trump is hoping lawmakers will help [ARG0: him] [V: drive] [ARG1: a tougher deal] , but he should n’t count on that .
Trump is hoping lawmakers will help him drive a tougher deal , but he [V: should] n’t count on that .
Trump is hoping lawmakers will help him drive a tougher deal , but [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: should] [ARGM-NEG: n’t] [V: count] [ARG1: on that] .
